## Features

- `regurgitate` creates a "Code Appendix" at the end of your document containing all code blocks.
- Configuration options:
  - `group-by-language`: Group code blocks in appendix by programming language.
  - `show-code-inline`: Control whether code remains inline or is removed.
  - `show-output-results`: Control whether execution results are included in appendix.
- Supports multiple programming languages (Python, R, Julia, etc.).
